txt.en: Acolytes of Lamentation were selected by their dark masters to serve within Bâr Nírnaeth for the span of their lifetimes, seduced by the promise of continued life beyond the moment of their deaths. But this was in truth unending servitude, and if ever the scales would fall from their eyes they might see the true horrors that awaited them.
Many Black Númenóreans have sworn servitude to Dolguzigir, in hopes that by assisting with his great work, he will share many dark secrets with them.
Defeat many dark cataloguers and dark curators in the Halls of Black Lore.
Ghashan-kútot, the Halls of Black Lore: Slayer of the Archivist's Assistants
